p.s: A simple channel server for PEAR compatible channels
p.d:
This package contains a set of scripts to create a simple PEAR compatible channel server. Included with the package are the scs- commands which are added to pyrus to manage a PEAR channel.
Example usage from the command line: php pyrus.phar scs-create pear.example.com "My Channel" php pyrus.phar scs-release MyPackage-0.0.0.tgz myhandle
More information here: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/channels.scs.php
